hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select * from REPS order by ID desc
select count(*) from (select * from REPS order by ID desc) wmTempTable
hibernate-mapping.query: select id as REPS_ID,name AS REPS_NAME,channelType AS REPS_CHANNEL_TYPE,picurl AS REPS_PIC_URL,username AS REPS_USERNAME from Reps
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ID as REPS_ID,NAME AS REPS_NAME,CHANNEL_TYPE AS REPS_CHANNELTYPE,PICURL AS REPS_PICURL,USERNAME AS REPS_USERNAME from REPS
select count(*) from (select ID as REPS_ID,NAME AS REPS_NAME,CHANNEL_TYPE AS REPS_CHANNELTYPE,PICURL AS REPS_PICURL,USERNAME AS REPS_USERNAME from REPS) wmTempTable
hibernate-mapping.query: select count(*) from Reps where channelType IN (:channelType)
